https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sS43rqPOIoLzTYHZJwAvVgJF2uV.jpg When a gay man is invited to what he mistakenly thinks is a pool party benefit to "Save the Polar Bears" he discovers that not all gay men go for sleek, svelte younger men and his social and sex lives improve immensly. A Bear's Story
